title: SQL Injection
description: A vulnerability allowing attackers to manipulate SQL queries.
impact: Data leakage, database modification, authentication bypass.
recommendations: Use prepared statements, parameterized queries, and ORM frameworks.

title: Cross-Site Scripting (XSS)
description: A vulnerability that allows injection of malicious scripts into webpages.
recommendations: Implement input validation, content security policy (CSP), and escaping output.

title: Insecure Direct Object Reference (IDOR)
description: Attackers can access unauthorized resources by manipulating object references.
recommendations: Use access controls, avoid exposing direct object references.
